```{r}
library(sf)
library(dplyr)
library(readr)
library(geojsonio)

# Load simplified GeoJSON
world <- st_read("path/to/simplified_world.geojson")

# Load your SDG CSV
sdg <- read_csv("SI_POV_DAY1.csv")

# Preview column names
names(sdg)

# Filter to a single year if needed
sdg_latest <- sdg %>% filter(TimePeriod == 2022)  # adjust column name and year

# Join by ISO code (adjust field names as needed)
world_sdg <- world %>%
  left_join(sdg_latest, by = c("ISO_A3" = "GeoAreaCode"))  # or "Country Code"

# Write new GeoJSON
geojson_write(world_sdg, file = "sdg_joined.geojson")

```
